api/pbuddy.CodeGenerationUtility.EditorS.title: Namespace pbuddy.CodeGenerationUtility.EditorScripts | Code Generation Utility documentation
api/pbuddy.CodeGenerationUtility.EditorS.keywords: Namespace pbuddy.CodeGenerationUtility.EditorScripts Classes CodeGenerationHelper Structs SectionIdentifiers Text describing the 'guards' around a given section of text (either in a template or generated code file) TemplateToReplace ... describe ... In contrast to SectionIdentifiers , this structure represents text that should be 'swapped out' when generating code.
